Question 1:
Which of the following best describes CWE-259?
Options:
A. Use of Hard-coded Password
B. Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
C. Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling
D. Improper Neutralization of Argument Delimiters in a Command ('Argument Injection')

---
